Comment.val: /*Functie om de indirecte portefeuille based kosten en gemiddelde portefeuille tebrekenen over de persistent vastgeleged performance bedragen. Indien nodig worddt er berekend, anders wordt alleen geaggregreerd. */

Text.val: For now we asume history by Year (and leap years don't exist)
Future use (may be cash-values will be historized separatedly.

SQL_STMT_U.val: select sum(a.value), m.cfcu_id, a.pcca_id from pc_historic_amounts a inner join pc_historic_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.phpb_id and a.pcca_id>1 and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id =b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1 inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id inner join map_calcrule_perf_cat m on m.pcc_cat = c.code group by m.cfcu_id, a.pcca_id

select avg(a.value) from pc_historic_amounts a inner join pc_historic_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.phpb_id and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id =b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1 and a.pcca_id = ~4
select sum(value) from pc_historic_portfolio_base a inner join performance_report r on r.id = a.pere_id and a.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 and r.ppr_id = ~1

select sum(a.value) indirect_cost from pc_historic_amounts a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id and c.code in (1) inner join pc_historic_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.phpb_id and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id = b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1
